attributes.action: Legalise the use of medicinal Cannabis
attributes.additional_details:
We believe as citizens of the United Kingdom that we should be allowed our justifiable right(s) to be treated with medicinal marijuana for any such medical condition or disorder which conventional prophylactic medicine(s) and treatment(s) fail to effectively treat, or, where medicinal marijuana is established to manage or aid in the effective treatment of any such medical condition(s).

We feel that as citizens of the United Kingdom that we should be free from persecution and prosecution from any such person(s) or establishment(s) that view the medicinal use of medicinal marijuana as a criminal offence.

We feel that substantial empirical medical evidence is currently available worldwide to justify our right(s) as citizens of the United Kingdom to allow us to treat any such medical condition with medicinal marijuana or its derivates and consider that as citizens of the United Kingdom we should be free to make any such personal choice(s).
